text: Ermera is one of the municipalities of East Timor. Its capital is Gleno. ==Administrative posts== The municipality's administrative posts (formerly sub-districts) are: * Atsabe Administrative Post * Ermera Administrative Post * Hatulia Administrative Post * Letefoho Administrative Post * Railaco Administrative Post The administrative posts are divided into 52 sucos ("villages") in total. Category:Municipalities of East Timor
title: Ermera Municipality
